====接收jms消息 [http://bbs.9ria.com/thread-70768-1-1.html 参考文献]====
{{{

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<s:Application xmlns:fx="http://ns.adobe.com/mxml/2009" 
			   xmlns:s="library://ns.adobe.com/flex/spark" 
			   xmlns:mx="library://ns.adobe.com/flex/mx" minWidth="955" minHeight="600"
			   applicationComplete="logon()">
	<fx:Declarations>
		<!-- Place non-visual elements (e.g., services, value objects) here -->
		<mx:Producer id="producer"
					 destination="my-topic"
					 acknowledge="acknowledgeHandler(event);"
					 fault="faultHandler(event)"/>
		
		<mx:Consumer id="consumer"
					 destination="my-topic"
					 message="messageHandler(event)"
					 acknowledge="acknowledgeHandler(event);"
					 fault="faultHandler(event)"/>
		 
	</fx:Declarations>
	
	<fx:Script>
		<![CDATA[
			import mx.rpc.events.FaultEvent;
			import mx.messaging.*;
			import mx.messaging.messages.*;
			import mx.messaging.events.*;
			import mx.controls.Alert;
			
			private function messageHandler(event:MessageEvent):void
			{
				receiveTextArea.text=event.message.body + "\n" + receiveTextArea.text;
			}
			
			private function acknowledgeHandler(event:MessageAckEvent):void
			{
			}
			
			private function faultHandler(event:MessageFaultEvent):void
			{
				Alert.show('Fault: '+event.faultString, 'Alert Box', mx.controls.Alert.OK);
			}
			
			
			private function logon():void
			{
				consumer.subscribe();
			}
			
			private function sendMessage():void
			{
				var message:AsyncMessage=new AsyncMessage();
				message.body=sendTextArea.text;
				producer.send(message);
				sendTextArea.text="";
			}
	
		]]>
	</fx:Script>
	 
	<mx:HBox>
	</mx:HBox> 
	
	<mx:TextArea id="receiveTextArea" x="11" y="35" width="50%" height="200"/>
	<mx:TextInput id="sendTextArea" x="12" y="248"/>
	<mx:Button x="185" y="252" label="Send" click="sendMessage();"/>
	
</s:Application>


}}}
